chat.editing_notice: Attachments will be resent with this message.
history.empty_state: No conversations yet. Start a new one!
settings.model_system_prompt_placeholder: You can enter a custom system prompt here to define the AI's personality and goals. If left empty, the default prompt will be used.
settings.api_key_gemini_info: Your API key is stored locally. If empty, the built-in key will be attempted.
settings.api_key_openai_info: Your API key is stored locally in your browser.
settings.api_model_select_info: Select a model from the list.
settings.api_model_fetch_info: e.g., gpt-4o. Or enter credentials and fetch available models.
settings.api_model_gemini_info: Select the Gemini model to use. Flash is faster for general tasks, while Pro is more capable for complex reasoning.
settings.api_key_error: Please enter an API Key first.
settings.api_key_invalid: Authentication failed. Please check if your API key is correct and has sufficient quota.
modal.delete_content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this note? This action cannot be undone.
modal.delete_message_content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this message? This action cannot be undone.
modal.delete_conversation_content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this conversation and all its messages? This action cannot be undone.
modal.unsaved_content: You have unsaved changes. Would you like to save them before leaving?
modal.clear_data_content: This will permanently delete all chat history, notes, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
modal.clear_data_success: All data has been successfully cleared.
modal.clear_data_error: An error occurred while clearing data. Please try again.
modal.rename_conversation_content: Enter a new name for the conversation:
modal.rename_note_content: Enter a new title for the note:
file.type_unsupported: File type for "{0}" is not supported.
file.max_attachments_error: You can upload a maximum of {0} files.
file.pdf_not_supported_openai: PDF file analysis is not supported with the OpenAI provider. Please switch to Gemini to use this file.
about.app_description: An AI-powered learning assistant designed to make learning intuitive and engaging.
toast.translation_fallback: Could not load translations for {0}. Falling back to English.
